column6: ALONE AND ADRIFT, Groot's got nobody to turn to now that his best pal Rocket Raccoon has been kidnapped! What's worse, cosmic calamity continues to strike, and when a cosmic storm threatens to destroy an entire world, it's up to Groot to stop it â€" but he can't do it alone! Featuring special guest stars DAWN GREENWOOD AND THE SILVER SURFER!
